page.title: 12Village Life- Football
page.content: Yaxham's home ground is Jubilee Park.They play against other clubs like Mattishall,Garvestone and East Tuddenham.The park was opened in 1980 by Katie Glass,and now most people in the village know it very well.Next to the park is the village hall,which they use for changing in.Yaxham play on Saturdays and the boys sometimes play on Sunday mornings;the men play again in the afternoon.There is a first team and a reserve team for those who are'nt good enough for the first team.One of the players'wives prepares the oranges,and the coach deals with any who are hurt.For many years there was only one side and they always played away because they did'nt have a ground.Later they played near the station.When Jubilee Park was built the mens'team re-formed and also the U13 and U15 teams were formed.
